results.content_html: A good grounding in Javascript with practical examples and a little bit of AJAX, JSON and php thrown in.

results.content:
Generally, this course covers some most import concepts in javascript. If you already have some experience in programming, it should rapidly improve your understanding in js (saves my time!). But if you have almost no knowledge in programming, you can also follow up this course easily, with some further reading or researching on your own.

Anyway, it's an awesome course! The learning route is brief and to the point.

response.content: Thank you for your support best wishes

results.content:
I am using this course to reacquaint myself with the basics I already know about JavaScript, and to gain more facility in preparation for an in-depth course. I look forward to seeing how the rest of the course develops. It has thus far been quite clear and easy to follow.

One thing that would improve the course overall is to smooth out transitions in lecture recordings, where sound abruptly comes in, sometimes in the middle of a word. Another more important way would be to smoothly transition learning content from one lesson to another. Rather than working on the same files over and over again, it would help if there were specific instructions to create new files to explore new functionalities.
